channel.title: AGR on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in AGR on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Elicit comments or feedback
item.description: Q: It is important to be receptive to others’ ideas and opinions. Tell us about a time when you had to elicit comments or feedback from another team member on an important issue? Probing Questions: • How did you let them know that you were interested in what they had to say? • What questions did you ask? • In the end did you have a good idea of that person’s ideas about the issue?
